name: Microsoft Temporary Font Installation File
summary: A TT2 file is a temporary file created by various versions of the Microsoft Office Installer, which includes Microsoft Office 2013 and 365, and Microsoft OneNote. It contains information about a TrueType Font .TTF file during the Microsoft Office installation process. The file is supposed to be deleted at the end of the installation process, but may be left due to a bug in the Installer utility.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
